content:
Sure! Here is a 90-day content calendar for Instagram and Etsy that focuses on helping Jasmine with her personal development while also promoting your Etsy shop:

Month 1:
Week 1:

* Monday: Introduce your Etsy shop and highlight your products that support mental health and wellness.
* Wednesday: Share a motivational quote or message to help Jasmine stay positive and focused on her goals.
* Friday: Share a blog post or article on personal finance tips for moms.

Week 2:

* Monday: Offer a discount code for one of your products that support self-care, like bath bombs or candles.
* Wednesday: Share a testimonial from a happy customer who found your products helpful for their own personal development.
* Friday: Share an Instagram Reel or Story about self-reflection and journaling.

Week 3:

* Monday: Share a blog post on how to practice gratitude and promote mental wellness.
* Wednesday: Feature a black-owned business in your Etsy shop's story.
* Friday: Share a motivational quote or message that encourages self-love and self-acceptance.

Week 4:

* Monday: Introduce a new product line that celebrates black culture and promotes self-expression.
* Wednesday: Share a story or testimonial from a happy customer who used one of your products to improve their mental health.
* Friday: Share a blog post on mindfulness exercises to help Jasmine stay present in the moment and reduce anxiety.

Month 2:
Week 1:

* Monday: Share a blog post on how to create a positive mindset and promote mental wellness.
* Wednesday: Offer a giveaway for one of your products that promote self-care and wellness.
* Friday: Share a motivational quote or message to help Jasmine stay positive and focused on her goals.

Week 2:

* Monday: Share a blog post on the benefits of aromatherapy and promote your aromatherapy products.
* Wednesday: Share a behind-the-scenes look at how you make your products to give customers a glimpse into your process.
* Friday: Share a post about how to set and achieve realistic goals for personal development.

Week 3:

* Monday: Share a blog post on the importance of self-care and promote your self-care products.
* Wednesday: Share a post about black mental health awareness.
* Friday: Share a motivational quote or message that encourages Jasmine to keep pushing forward.

Week 4:

* Monday: Introduce a new line of products that promote mindfulness and meditation.
* Wednesday: Offer a discount code for one of your wellness products.
* Friday: Share a blog post on the importance of self-reflection and personal growth.

Month 3:
Week 1:

* Monday: Share a motivational quote or message to help Jasmine stay focused on her personal development goals.
* Wednesday: Share a story or testimonial from a customer who used your products to improve their mental health.
* Friday: Offer a giveaway for one of your wellness products.

Week 2:

* Monday: Share a blog post on how to practice self-care and promote your self-care products.
* Wednesday: Share a post about how to maintain a healthy work-life balance.
* Friday: Share a motivational quote or message about self-love and self-acceptance.

Week 3:

* Monday: Share a blog post on the benefits of herbal teas and promote your line of herbal teas.
* Wednesday: Share a post about how to stay motivated and achieve your goals.
* Friday: Share a motivational quote or message that encourages Jasmine to prioritize her mental health.

Week 4:

* Monday: Offer a discount code for one of your aromatherapy products.
* Wednesday: Share a story or testimonial from a happy customer who found your products helpful for their own personal development.
* Friday: Share a blog post on the importance
